Name: Unfading Scar VI
Desc:
Transforms your body into a spear to pierce through enemies.
Also, permanently enhances Returning Hatred.
Changes to Scarlet Charge Drive in Flora form.
Required Skill: Unfading Scar Lv. 20 or higher

H.Old:
Attacks up to 8 enemies at 990% damage 6 times.
Max HP +2% on hit.
Cooldown: 3 sec.
[Passive Effects: Returning Hatred Damage +480%p]
